documents.title: Call Script Generator Overview
documents.content: Genie generates real-time call scripts based on customer requirement, tone, service category, and employee level. Scripts adapt to Website, Ads, AI, App, and Custom services.

documents.title: Generic Opening Script
documents.content: Hello! This is from Cloudora. Am I speaking with NAME? I'm here to understand your requirement and help you with the best solution.

documents.title: Qualification Questions
documents.content: Key questions: What service do you need? What is your business about? What is your budget range? What timeline are you targeting? Have you tried this service before?

documents.title: Closing Script
documents.content: Perfect! Iâ€™ll share details with you now and update our team. You will receive our proposal shortly. Thank you for choosing Cloudora!
